effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

flavor_text.x-y: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.
